events.info: Born in Tallinn, Estonia, to parents Hilel and Hasse Umov.
Evacuated to Andijon, Uzbekistan, with her mother and grandmother during World War II.
Returned to Tallinn after the war; attended a Russian school and became friends with Tsylia Perelman and Pesse Speranskaya.
Experienced profound grief upon hearing of Stalin's death during her 8th-grade year.
Maternal grandmother Ella Marjenburger passed away; buried in the Jewish cemetery in Tallinn.
Married Yevgeniy Kuznetsov, a musician; the couple had no children.
Witnessed the establishment of the Jewish community in Estonia, the first officially registered Jewish cultural organization in the USSR.
Interviewed by Centropa, sharing her life experiences and reflections.
